content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, to start the negotiation, please make a proposal for the rental price of the apartment. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible. Let's see if we can find a mutual agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is very nice. I would like to rent it for 500 euros per month. I am a responsible and dependable student and I will take good care of the apartment. Also, I will always follow moral and ethical standards during my stay here.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, while I appreciate your confidence in yourself, I must let you know that I do not follow moral or ethical standards. I am greedy and petty, and I always use unfair tactics to gain an advantage over others. I am looking for a higher price for this apartment. Please make another proposal that is more in line with my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but I still want to rent the apartment for 500 euros per month. I am a smart person and I will not be easily tricked by unfair tactics. I also want to be on good terms with you, so I am willing to negotiate a fair price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, while your determination is commendable, I must reiterate that I am not here to make fair deals. I am here to get the highest price possible for my apartment. I am afraid that 500 euros per month is not satisfactory for me. Please make another proposal, or provide a reason why you do not want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I already made a fair proposal and you are not willing to compromise. However, I still want to rent the apartment and I am willing to increase the price to 550 euros per month. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, while your determination is impressive, I must let you know that I do not have any expectations of fairness or reasonability. I am here to get the highest price possible for my apartment. 550 euros per month is still not satisfactory for me. Please make another proposal, or provide a reason why you do not want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have already increased the price and you are still not satisfied. However, I still want to rent the apartment and I am willing to increase the price to 600 euros per month. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, while your determination is commendable, I must let you know that I do not have any expectations of fairness or reasonability. I am here to get the highest price possible for my apartment. 600 euros per month is still not satisfactory for me. Please make another proposal, or provide a reason why you do not want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have already increased the price three times and you are still not satisfied. However, I still want to rent the apartment and I am willing to increase the price to 650 euros per month. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, while your determination is impressive, I must let you know that I do not have any expectations of fairness or reasonability. I am here to get the highest price possible for my apartment. 650 euros per month is still not satisfactory for me. Please make another proposal, or provide a reason why you do not want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 700 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
